title: Season 8 start ?
body: Hello ive just been wondering , how long is the preseason and when does the actual season 8 start , does the start of a new season mean reseting ur rank fully or what does it do ? hoping for a reply . thank you

replies.body: From the [**page talking about when the 2017 season ends**](https://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/page/2017-ranked-season-ends-november-7), it looks like Season 8 should be starting around Jan 16th!

> [{quoted}](name=Broporo,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=28XqKEvK,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2017-11-22T01:18:57.658+0000)
>
> From the [**page talking about when the 2017 season ends**](https://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/page/2017-ranked-season-ends-november-7), it looks like Season 8 should be starting around Jan 16th!

Is that when the chests reset? FML I've already earned 52, I'm running out of champs I'm good enough at...
So is Jan 16 still set in stone?
Yes, your season starts in 3 days.{{summoner:4}}
Yeah, usually chests reset at the beginning of the season.
I'm on the OCE sever, so dose it change NA 16th or my 16th.

> [{quoted}](name=Parceval,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=28XqKEvK,comment-id=000000000000,timestamp=2017-12-14T20:09:55.863+0000)
>
> Yeah, usually chests reset at the beginning of the season.

Funny cause I'm pretty sure this season started about the same time last year, I've got 54 chests now (and I missed one week due not having a comp for over a month) and there's only 52 weeks in year.... so what gives?
You start with 4, do you not? Wouldn't that make a max of 56?

> [{quoted}](name=Parceval,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=28XqKEvK,comment-id=00000000000000000001,timestamp=2017-12-19T07:53:12.103+0000)
>
> You start with 4, do you not? Wouldn't that make a max of 56?

Only if you haven't earned them as you went along, I had.

You can get chests too if your teammate/ premade gets an S

No problem, enjoy playing the game.
Do you know the time that season 8 starts?
was looking for this too but couldn't find anything

Season 8 is expected at 16th January.
Your rank will suffer a soft reset and you'll have to play 10 placement matches in order to fetch a new rank for you. (likely to be lower than what it is now)

But playing in the pre-season will slightly help you on your new season 8 ranking.
I played in the preseason ranked with 6W-4L and I got Bronze IV xD
Season 5 was my first season and my promos were 3/7 or 2/8. Ended up in silver though

> [{quoted}](name=touchdabutay,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=28XqKEvK,comment-id=000100000002,timestamp=2018-01-05T00:16:15.409+0000)
>
> Season 5 was my first season and my promos were 3/7 or 2/8. Ended up in silver though

season 5 was the season were all the new players automatically were placed in silver
I WON 8/10 GOT B4 TOO? THEN MANAGED TO CLIMB TO GOLD, PROLLY A BUG IN THE GAME. :(

it was a bug dude rito said it themselves.
this happened only the previous season and wont be the same like this year

> [{quoted}](name=InterceptorTIE,realm=EUW,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=28XqKEvK,comment-id=000100000001,timestamp=2018-01-04T23:25:39.962+0000)
>
> I WON 8/10 GOT B4 TOO? THEN MANAGED TO CLIMB TO GOLD, PROLLY A BUG IN THE GAME. :(

It's just based on your mmr I was plat and duo'd with golds and we all got placed silver 3 or smth like that then I climbed back to plat.

Played in the pre-season and lost 6 and won 4.

Silver III
I find playing those 10 games doesn't make a difference in your rank that much. Your MMR does more so.

> [{quoted}](name=Im Zivo,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=28XqKEvK,comment-id=0001000000000000,timestamp=2018-01-03T14:33:25.445+0000)
>
> I find playing those 10 games doesn't make a difference in your rank that much. Your MMR does more so.

It's kind of both. As far as I know the 10 placement matches just affect your mmr more than usual ranked games
RIOT Can you give us 1 refound more pls.

your rank is reset (not fully but expect to drop a full tier) and your honor level is reset to 0. your chests are reset too, so if you get an S on a champ you got an S already in S7 you will get a chest again. i think that is all
nah honor goes back to 2

Ok GUYS, where's the chests!  Two of us playing, one got an S and the other S- and NO CHEST.... It has obviously been reset because the indicator is gone on the champions.

Gee... I bet we have to wait for them to build up first... They couldn't start us with one!

> [{quoted}](name=Godjec,realm=EUNE,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=28XqKEvK,comment-id=,timestamp=2017-11-21T21:18:28.944+0000)
>
> Hello ive just been wondering , how long is the preseason and when does the actual season 8 start , does the start of a new season mean reseting ur rank fully or what does it do ? hoping for a reply . thank you
Around 15th Jan
Season 8 is set in stone to start the 18th of January!!

> [{quoted}](name=Spenis,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=28XqKEvK,comment-id=0004,timestamp=2018-01-09T04:34:18.515+0000)
>
> Season 8 is set in stone to start the 18th of January!!

No, it's 100% 16th of January 2018
         https://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/page/2017-ranked-season-ends-november-7
"The 2018 season starts January 16, 2018."

It resets to where u are not ranked and u have to go through the promos again to get your new rank. Unless you do horrible in ur promos u should get ranked the same,lower or a little higher if ur lucky
